entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
